urls.title: Pelosi Tours San Francisco’s Chinatown To Quell Coronavirus Fears – CBS San Francisco
urls.description: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi walked through San Francisco's Chinatown District Monday, attempting to quell fears about the current outbreak of the coronavirus that has kept customers out of shops and restaurants and tourists away from the streets.

text:
@realDonaldTrump Then why was Nancy telling everyone to visit Chinatown. Everything is okay

https://t.co/7XDlNia2Dp
